original_text: Then David came to the two hundred men who had been too exhausted to follow him and who were left behind at the Besor Valley. They came out to meet David and the men with him. As David and his men approached, he asked them how they were.
korean_text: 다윗이 전에 피곤하여 능히 자기를 따르지 못하므로 브솔 시내에 머물게 한 이백 명에게 오매 그들이 다윗과 그와 함께 한 백성을 영접하러 나오는지라 다윗이 그 백성에게 이르러 문안하매

sentences.original_text: Then David came to the two hundred men
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗은 이백 명의 남자에게 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: who had been too exhausted to follow him
and who were left behind at the Besor Valley
They came out to meet David
As David and his men approached
he asked them how they were
